item.title: Open Source Reading List
item.description: Introduction to FOSS Open Source GuidesGitHub.com Introduction to Open SourceDigital Ocean FAQ in FOSSOpensource.com Project Management Why (some) agile teams fail - Jen Krieger @mrry550 How we organize GitHub issues: A simple styleguide for tagging - Zach Dunn @zachdunn Documentation Your step-by-step guide to more effective documentation - Lauri Apple @LappleApple A template for creating open source contributor guidelines - Safia Abdalla @captainsafia
